Name: Lime Sour
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Garnish with lime wedge on rim.
Review: It's sweet 'n' sour, undeniably limey, cleaning and refreshing. Enjoy as a palate cleanser before or after a meal.
Nutrition: One serving of Lime Sour contains 95 calories
